item.title: Noble Corp S-1
item.description: Noble Corp, which is in the Drilling Oil & Gas Wells [1381] industry, SEC S-1 filing on April 21, 2021 had 19482 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: shares - 535 instances ordinary - 490 instances noble - 361 instances may - 190 instances 1 - 172 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
